entries.label: Pinpoint
entries.description: An all-in-one applicant tracking system designed to streamline the hiring process by organising tasks such as discovering, approaching, reviewing, interviewing, and hiring candidates suitable for your requirements and work culture.

entries.label: PoppAI
entries.description: PoppAI is an AI-driven platform designed to screen applicants efficiently and engage candidates through conversations.

entries.label: HireSweet
entries.description: HireSweet is a Candidate Relationship Management (CRM) tool that leverages AI to source and nurture candidates. It simplifies candidate tracking, outreach automation, and pipeline management, helping recruiters build long-term relationships.

entries.label: Apollo
entries.description: A sales intelligence and engagement platform that provides access to a vast database of contacts and companies, helping businesses find and connect with potential customers.

entries.label: Hubspot
entries.description: A comprehensive CRM platform offering tools for marketing, sales, customer service, and content management to help businesses grow and manage customer relationships effectively.

entries.label: Lattice
entries.description: A people management platform that helps companies align, engage, and grow their employees through performance management, employee engagement surveys, and career development tools.

entries.label: Workramp
entries.description: A learning management system that provides training and development solutions for employees, helping organisations onboard, train, and develop their teams effectively.

entries.label: Hibob
entries.description: HiBob is a modern HR platform designed for small and medium-sized businesses, offering features like employee management, payroll, and performance tracking to streamline HR processes.

entries.label: Loxo
entries.description: Loxo is a talent intelligence platform that combines an applicant tracking system (ATS), customer relationship management (CRM), and AI-driven sourcing to enhance recruitment efficiency.

entries.label: Eightfold.ai
entries.description: Eightfold.ai offers a Talent Intelligence Platform that uses AI to help companies with talent acquisition, management, and diversity initiatives by analysing skills and potential.

entries.label: retrain.ai
entries.description: Retrain.ai provides an AI-powered talent intelligence platform that helps organisations identify skill gaps, reskill employees, and optimise workforce planning.

entries.label: phenom
entries.description: Phenom is a Talent Experience Management (TXM) platform that uses AI to enhance the experiences of candidates, recruiters, employees, and management throughout the talent lifecycle.

entries.label: HireEz
entries.description: HireEz (formerly Hiretual) is an AI-powered outbound recruiting platform that helps recruiters source and engage candidates across various channels efficiently.

entries.label: SWARM
entries.description: SWARM is a collaborative hiring platform that enables teams to work together on candidate evaluation, interview scheduling, and feedback collection to improve hiring outcomes.

entries.label: Findem.ai
entries.description: Findem.ai is a talent acquisition platform that uses AI to help companies discover, engage, and hire candidates based on comprehensive attribute data.

entries.label: Jiminny
entries.description: This a conversation intelligence platform. Jiminny's AI turns every email, phone and video call into game-changing insights, revenue intelligence and business-winning behaviours.

entries.label: Gong
entries.description: Gong is a revenue intelligence platform that analyses sales conversations and provides insights to improve sales team performance and customer interactions.

entries.label: Gatekeeper
entries.description: Gatekeeper is a vendor and contract management solution that helps organisations manage supplier relationships, contracts, and compliance through a centralised platform.

entries.label: Beamery
entries.description: Beamery is a talent lifecycle management platform that assists companies in attracting, engaging, and retaining talent through AI-driven insights and automation.

entries.label: Adway
entries.description: Adway is an AI-powered social recruitment marketing platform that helps organisations attract talent by leveraging social media and automation. It uses artificial intelligence to create and distribute job adverts on platforms such as LinkedIn, Facebook, and Instagram, targeting the right candidates based on employer branding and recruitment needs.

entries.label: App Cast
entries.description: Appcast is a programmatic job advertising platform that helps organisations optimise their recruitment marketing. It automates job advert placements across a network of job sites, using data and algorithms to improve hiring efficiency, reduce costs, and enhance applicant quality.

entries.label: HiredScore
entries.description: HiredScore is an AI-powered HR technology that integrates with existing systems to enhance talent acquisition and management through data-driven insights and automation.

entries.label: SkyHive
entries.description: SkyHive uses artificial intelligence to provide labor market intelligence, helping organisations with workforce planning, reskilling, and talent acquisition strategies.

entries.label: Noebrain
entries.description: Noebrain offers AI-driven solutions for talent assessment and development, focusing on cognitive and behavioral evaluations to enhance hiring and training processes.
